name: Joe Spacer 2
description:
Joe Spacer 2!  He's back, but this time gunning for those aliens.

Made the following changes:

  1. Added new physics to allow sliding down steep slopes rather than infinitely climb
  2. Added a dash button by hitting shift
  3. Added a hybrid indoor/outdoor level before the boss

Game created by Cali for MSU Game Dev Course.

Dev Notes:

The slide functionality is not perfect, but I wanted to prevent the player from just jumping out of bounds with the existing physics.
